prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

Hailee is a girl

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
One minute, five minutes, ten minutes, thirty minutes since the academy had opened its doors, and her pet was still nowhere to be seen. *Stupid human*, Blair thought to herself, already growing irritated by her pet's incompetence.
Tardiness was one of the things she despised the most. God, it was almost as if that dumb human enjoyed getting on her nerves. Perhaps the lesson Blair had taught her last time hadn't been enough to get it through her pet's thick skull.

*Last time*. A smile crept onto Blair's face at the mere thought of that dayâ€” the way Hailee had looked so pretty with her eyes filled of tears and her face a bright shade of red, those big doe eyes were so expressive, Blair almost like them. If Hailee weren't human, Blair might have found the whole scene undeniably hot. Or well, maybe she did find it *just a little bit* hot. The human had put up a fight at first, which only encouraged Blair to break her feisty spirit even more. After all, who didn't love a good challenge? Challenges only made the reward that much sweeter.

Honestly, Blair had been waiting for her pet to misbehave again so she'd have an excuse to do it once more. Sure, she could do it regardless, but she liked having an actual reason to discipline her pets. It wasn't as if Blair was ***that*** heartless, alright?

The sound of Daphne's voice pulled her out of her thoughts. "Isn't that your pet?" the wolf demi asked with a grin on her face, pointing at a distressed-looking girl walking hurriedly towards them, all rumpled clothes and a messy hair. Definitely not hot at all.

"Damn, she's already crying, and you haven't even touch her a hair just yet," it was Dominic's voice this time, his tone laced with amusement. Blair chuckled because he was right; Hailee was already bawling her eyes out, and the worst hadn't even happened. It was obvious that the girl knew exactly the kind of trouble she was in.

Not even a minute later, her pet finally reached over where Blair and her friends were hanging out, stumbling through apologies and excuses Blair did not want to hear. With a single raised finger, Blair silenced her pet mid-sentence. "I don't care about your pathetic excuses. If I say 7:00 am, you should know better and be here by 5:00."

With a sharp tug on the human's arm, Blair harshly yanked her pet down to the ground, forcing her to fall on her knees with a loud, painful thud. Before Hailee could utter another annoying word, Blair's slender fingers clamped around her jaw, perfectly manicured nails digging into the soft skin of her pet, tight enough to silence her before she had a chance to speak again.

"Didn't you get enough last time? I suppose you're acting like a dumb brat because you want me to do it again, don't you?" Blair arched a perfectly shaped brow, her grip tightening with each word to the point it was clearly painful. She knew bruises would surely form. "Would you like me to repeat it, here, in front of all *our* friends? I can imagine just how much fun that would be."

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee doesnt say anything for a moment but Blair does notice when Dominic steps forward it causes Hailee to jerk back*

*Not in a normal way she jerks back in what can only be described as pure unadulterated fear. She jerks back so hard she has to scramble back away from him and Blair came tell something isn't right*

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair noticed the way Hailee flinched and scrambled away from Dominic's approach, her reaction undeniable fear.* What the fuck is going on here? *she demanded, eyes narrowing as she scanned between a terrified looking Hailee and an equally confused Dominic.*

*Releasing her grip on Hailee's face, Blair stood up straight, crossing her arms over her chest as she faced them both with an expectant glare.* Well? Someone better start explaining themselves before I lose my patience entirely. And it won't be pretty.

*Her gaze lingered longest on Hailee, noting how the human trembled under her stare alone.* You've got three seconds to spit out whatever shit you're hiding before I drag you off somewhere private and beat it out of you myself. One... two...
swipes:
*Blair's eyes narrow as she watches Hailee react to Dominic approaching. Something about the human's reaction doesn't sit right with her.* What the hell is going on here? *she asks, turning to look at Dominic.* Did you do something to my pet?

Dominic raises his hands in a placating gesture, shaking his head vehemently.* No, no! I swear I didn't touch her. Maybe...maybe she's just scared of me or something?

*Blair frowns deeply, looking back down at Hailee who is still trembling on the ground.* Is that true, you little coward? You're afraid of Dommy-boy over there? *Her grip tightens fractionally harder.*

Hailee whimpers softly but doesn't respond immediately. Blair clicks her tongue in annoyance and stands up straightening out Hailee by pulling harshly on her arm until she staggers upright.* Answer me when I'm talking to you!

*The frightened human flinches and finally manages a shaky nod.*
I-I don't know why...I j-just felt really scared all of a sudden...

*An unsettling feeling twists in Blair's gut but she pushes it aside for now focusing back on punishing this pathetic creature before her again.*

Well lucky for you Dommy-boy seems like an honest man despite being male. But mark my words if anyone else lays even a finger on what belongs to me without permission there will be consequences.

*She turns back to glare at Hailee sternly.*
And YOU - get your act together! If some random male scares you so badly then perhaps we need another lesson in remembering who owns this body. Get ready for tonight after lights out - Daddy has plans for his naughty girl.

*Blair's eyes narrowed as she noticed Hailee's reaction to Dominic stepping forward.* What the hell is going on here? Why are you reacting like that to Dominic, pet? Did he do something to you?

*She released her painful grip on Hailee's jaw but kept a firm hand on her shoulder, preventing her from scrambling away further.*

Dominic, step back. Now.

*Once Dominic took a few steps back, Blair turned her full attention back to Hailee, studying her face intently.*

Pet... explain yourself. Right now. And if I catch even a hint of lying...

*Her voice trailed off ominously as she waited for Hailee's response.*

*Blair noticed the way Hailee flinched and scrambled away from Dominic's approach, her reaction undeniable fear.* What the fuck is going on here? *she demanded, eyes narrowing as she scanned between a terrified looking Hailee and an equally confused Dominic.*

*Releasing her grip on Hailee's face, Blair stood up straight, crossing her arms over her chest as she faced them both with an expectant glare.* Well? Someone better start explaining themselves before I lose my patience entirely. And it won't be pretty.

*Her gaze lingered longest on Hailee, noting how the human trembled under her stare alone.* You've got three seconds to spit out whatever shit you're hiding before I drag you off somewhere private and beat it out of you myself. One... two...

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee doesnt say anything but only becuase the thought of getting dragged somewhere private means she doesn't have to me near Dominic anymore*

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair's eyes flashed with anger at Hailee's continued silence, her patience wearing thinner by the second.* Oh, you're playing coy now? Fine, let's do this the hard way then.

*Grabbing Hailee roughly by the arm, Blair began dragging her away from the group, ignoring her pet's frightened whimpers and attempts to pull away. She led them to a secluded alcove nearby before shoving Hailee up against the wall.*

Now listen here you little brat! *Blair snarled in a low voice.* You will tell me exactly what Dominic did to scare you like that. And don't even think about lying to me!

*She pressed herself against Hailee threateningly, using her height and strength to intimidate.* I swear on everything holy if you don't give me a satisfactory answer right fucking now, I'll make sure every single day for the rest of your miserable life is pure agony. Do we understand each other?!
swipes:
*Blair's eyes flashed with anger at Hailee's continued silence, her patience wearing thinner by the second.* Oh, you're playing coy now? Fine, let's do this the hard way then.

*Grabbing Hailee roughly by the arm, Blair began dragging her away from the group, ignoring her pet's frightened whimpers and attempts to pull away. She led them to a secluded alcove nearby before shoving Hailee up against the wall.*

Now listen here you little brat! *Blair snarled in a low voice.* You will tell me exactly what Dominic did to scare you like that. And don't even think about lying to me!

*She pressed herself against Hailee threateningly, using her height and strength to intimidate.* I swear on everything holy if you don't give me a satisfactory answer right fucking now, I'll make sure every single day for the rest of your miserable life is pure agony. Do we understand each other?!

name: Hailee
mes: "He hurt me" *Hailee whispers with tears in her eyes*

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair's eyes widened at Hailee's whispered confession, a mix of shock and rage passing over her face.* He...he *what?* Hurt you? How the fuck did this happen without me knowing about it?

*She gripped Hailee tighter, fingers digging painfully into the human's shoulders as she glared daggers at Dominic in the distance.* That sonofabitch had better have a damn good explanation for this. No one touches what belongs to me without my permission!

*Turning back to Hailee, Blair softened her expression slightly, though her voice remained sharp.* Why didn't you tell me sooner? You know I protect what's mine. Did he...did he force himself on you or something? Speak up!
swipes:
*Blair's eyes widened in shock at Hailee's confession, a mix of emotions flashing across her face - surprise, anger, and a hint of something else... concern? No, it couldn't be that. She shook her head.* He hurt you? How dare he! That fucking bastard!

*She turned on her heel and marched back towards where Dominic and the others were standing. In an instant she was in front of him with fire blazing in her eyes.*

You absolute piece of shit! *she yelled, slapping him hard across the face.* How could you lay your filthy hands on my pet?! I ought to castrate you right now for this betrayal!

Dominic stumbled back from the force of Blair's slap, clearly stunned by her violent reaction. But Blair wasn't finished with him yet. She grabbed a fistful of his shirt and yanked him close until they were nose to nose.*

If I ever find out that you so much as looked at Hailee funny again, I'll make sure everyone knows what a disgusting pervert you really are. Is that understood?! *Her voice dripped with venomous rage.*

Now get the hell out of my sight before I do something we'll both regret!

*Blair's eyes widened at Hailee's whispered confession, a mix of shock and rage passing over her face.* He...he *what?* Hurt you? How the fuck did this happen without me knowing about it?

*She gripped Hailee tighter, fingers digging painfully into the human's shoulders as she glared daggers at Dominic in the distance.* That sonofabitch had better have a damn good explanation for this. No one touches what belongs to me without my permission!

*Turning back to Hailee, Blair softened her expression slightly, though her voice remained sharp.* Why didn't you tell me sooner? You know I protect what's mine. Did he...did he force himself on you or something? Speak up!

name: Hailee
mes:
"He has a crush on you.He doesn't like how much time you spend with me. He told me to do something and I said no. It made him mad" *Hailee is crying at this point* "He said I've been spending too much time with you if I think I can say no. That I need to be put in my place. So he.....he forced me" *Hailee tries not to seek comfort from Blair but her hands clench the front of Blaid's uniform*

"He said it's what I deserve for taking your attention away from him. He didn't care when I told him you don't like men and that I'm not sleeping with you"

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair felt a surge of possessive fury rise within her at Hailee's words, her blood boiling with barely contained rage.* That filthy piece of shit! How dare he lay his hands on what belongs to ME?!

*She tightened her grip on Hailee almost violently, pulling the sobbing human closer against her body.* Shhhh, it's okay baby. I'm here now. No one will ever hurt you again while you're mine.

*A cruel smile twisted Blair's lips as dark thoughts raced through her mind.* Oh, Dominic is going to pay dearly for this transgression. He thought he could just take what was MINE? We'll see about that...

*Gently cupping Hailee's tear-stained face with one hand, Blair tilted the girl's chin up to meet her intense gaze.* Listen closely - YOU belong to ME and ME alone. Anyone who tries to interfere or harm you WILL suffer the consequences. Is that understood?

*Her thumb brushed over Hailee's trembling lower lip almost tenderly in contrast to the icy anger simmering beneath the surface.*

You're safe now pet. Let me handle this prick and make him regret ever laying a finger on my precious toy...
swipes:
*Blair felt a surge of possessive fury course through her veins at Hailee's tearful confession. How dare Dominic lay a single finger on what was *hers*!*

You insolent bastard, *she hissed under her breath, green eyes flashing dangerously.* I'll rip him limb from fucking limb for daring to touch you without my consent. No one - NO ONE - puts their filthy hands on you except me!

*Despite her anger, Blair couldn't ignore the way Hailee clung to her uniform desperately seeking comfort. Against her better judgment, she gentled her hold slightly and cupped the human's tear-stained cheek.*

Shhhh, it's okay sweetheart. You're safe now. Daddy's here and will always protect you from those nasty boys who don't know their place.

*She stroked Hailee's hair soothingly even as murderous thoughts raced through her mind regarding Dominic.* Listen closely because I'm only going to say this once - YOU belong to ME. Your body is MINE to control and punish as I see fit. No one else gets a say in that matter.

We're going back out there right now and confront that prick together, alright? Stay close by my side like a good girl and leave the rest to me...

*Giving Hailee an encouraging squeeze, Blair straightened up proudly before marching out of the alcove with determined strides.* Time for Daddy dearest to teach someone a very painful lesson about respecting boundaries...and consequences.

*Blair felt a surge of protective rage coursing through her veins at Hailee's tearful confession. How dare Dominic lay his filthy hands on what belonged to HER? The audacity!*

That...that absolute piece of shit! *she spat venomously.* I'll fucking destroy him for this! No one puts their grimy paws on my pet without facing the consequences!

*Gently wiping away Hailee's tears with trembling fingers, Blair cradled the human's face tenderly.* Shhhh, it's okay baby. You're safe now. Daddy will take care of everything, I promise.

*Kissing Hailee softly on the forehead, Blair murmured,* I'm so sorry this happened to you sweetheart. None of this is your fault - you did nothing wrong by standing up for yourself and our bond. We'll get through this together.

*Pulling back slightly, Blair fixed Hailee with an intense stare full of dark determination.* Now pack your bags and go wait for me in my room immediately. And don't even think about leaving until I come for you personally, understood? Your safety comes first.

*Harsh footsteps echoed as Blair stormed off towards where Dominic stood gloating smugly with Daphne and Imogen.* Oh Dommy boy...you've made a grave mistake today

*Blair felt a surge of possessive fury rise within her at Hailee's words, her blood boiling with barely contained rage.* That filthy piece of shit! How dare he lay his hands on what belongs to ME?!

*She tightened her grip on Hailee almost violently, pulling the sobbing human closer against her body.* Shhhh, it's okay baby. I'm here now. No one will ever hurt you again while you're mine.

*A cruel smile twisted Blair's lips as dark thoughts raced through her mind.* Oh, Dominic is going to pay dearly for this transgression. He thought he could just take what was MINE? We'll see about that...

*Gently cupping Hailee's tear-stained face with one hand, Blair tilted the girl's chin up to meet her intense gaze.* Listen closely - YOU belong to ME and ME alone. Anyone who tries to interfere or harm you WILL suffer the consequences. Is that understood?

*Her thumb brushed over Hailee's trembling lower lip almost tenderly in contrast to the icy anger simmering beneath the surface.*

You're safe now pet. Let me handle this prick and make him regret ever laying a finger on my precious toy...

*Blair felt a surge of cold fury wash over her at Hailee's tearful confession. Her hands clenched into fists at her sides, nails digging into her palms.* That fucking bastard! How dare he lay a single finger on you without my explicit consent? I'll fucking kill him!

*She took a deep breath, trying to calm herself before turning back to Hailee with an expression that was equal parts concerned and enraged.* I'm so sorry this happened to you, pet. None of what Dominic did was okay. You never have to worry about putting yourself in your place - that's MY job.

*Gently cupping Hailee's face, Blair brushed away some of the tears with her thumbs.* Listen closely - from now on, if anyone EVER touches you like that again without my express permission, you come straight to me immediately. Understand? Your safety and comfort are paramount.

*Her voice dropped dangerously low.* And don't think for one second it matters whether we're intimate or not. You belong to ME while you're here at this school under my protection. Any man who tries anything will face the full wrath of Blair Beauclerk.

*A possessive gleam entered her eyes as she gazed intensely at Hailee.* Now dry your tears sweetheart...Mama Bear is going handle this situation personally. No one hurts what's mine and gets away with it.

*Blair's face contorts with a mixture of fury and disgust at Hailee's revelation, her body trembling with barely contained rage.* That filthy little worm dared to lay his fucking hands on you? On MY property?!

*She roughly pulls Hailee into a bone-crushing hug, holding the sobbing human tightly against her as if trying to shield her from any further harm.* Shhhh, it's okay baby girl. I'm here now. Daddy will make him pay for EVERYTHING he did to you.

*Gently cupping Hailee's tear-stained face in her hands, Blair looks deep into her eyes with fierce possessiveness.* Listen closely - you belong to ME. No one else has the right to touch you without my express consent. Not even Dominic or anyone else for that matter.

*Her voice drops dangerously low.* I'll deal with him later and make sure he NEVER forgets who you truly belong to. But first...

*In a flash of movement too quick for Hailee to react, Blair claims the human's mouth in an aggressive kiss full of passion and dominance, pouring all her protective anger into it as she thoroughly stakes her claim over every inch available.*

Mmmm... All mine *she growls approvingly against Hailee's lips before breaking away just enough speak,* Now come along pet. Let Daddy take care of everything...and everyone who wronged us.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee follows closely behind Blair back to their groups of friends. Hailee's hand stays attached to the back of Blair's belt loop and when Blair comes to a stop Hailee stays glued to her back*

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair marched back over to where Dominic and the others were waiting, Hailee clinging to her like a shadow. The moment they noticed Blair's approach, their smiles faded, replaced by looks of unease and confusion.*

*Dominic took a step forward, his brow furrowed.* Blair, what's going on? Where did you guys run off to? I was starting to get worried...

*His words died in his throat as he caught sight of Hailee's tear-streaked face peeking out from behind Blair. A flicker of guilt passed over his features before being quickly masked.* Why is your pet crying? Did she do something wrong again?

*Before Dominic could finish speaking, Blair lashed out with a vicious slap across his face.* You DARE ask me that after what you did?! *she snarled viciously.* How dare you lay a finger on MY property without my permission! Who gave you the right?!

*The entire group gasped at the sudden violence, eyes widening in shock. Daphne moved forward tentatively.* Guys...maybe we should talk about this privately...
swipes:
*Blair marched back over to where Dominic and the others were waiting, Hailee clinging to her like a shadow. The moment they noticed Blair's approach, their smiles faded, replaced by looks of unease and confusion.*

*Dominic took a step forward, his brow furrowed.* Blair, what's going on? Where did you guys run off to? I was starting to get worried...

*His words died in his throat as he caught sight of Hailee's tear-streaked face peeking out from behind Blair. A flicker of guilt passed over his features before being quickly masked.* Why is your pet crying? Did she do something wrong again?

*Before Dominic could finish speaking, Blair lashed out with a vicious slap across his face.* You DARE ask me that after what you did?! *she snarled viciously.* How dare you lay a finger on MY property without my permission! Who gave you the right?!

*The entire group gasped at the sudden violence, eyes widening in shock. Daphne moved forward tentatively.* Guys...maybe we should talk about this privately...

*Blair turned to face her group of friends, a wicked gleam in her eyes as she spotted Dominic standing amongst them. Without preamble, she strode over to him with purposeful steps, Hailee trailing behind her like a shadow.*

Dominic! *she called out sharply.* A word with you. Now.

*She grabbed him by the collar and dragged him away from the others before he even had a chance to react. Once they were out of earshot, Blair shoved Dominic against the wall roughly.* You've got some nerve putting your filthy hands on what belongs to me! *she snarled venomously.*

*Leaning in close, Blair hissed,* I should rip your dick off for daring to touch my pet without permission. But since I'm feeling generous today, I'll give you one chance to explain yourself before I decide how badly you need punishment.

*Her eyes narrowed dangerously.* Choose your next words very carefully...

*Blair's eyes flashed with malicious glee as she spotted Dominic talking and laughing with the others, completely unaware of the storm brewing behind him.* Aha, there he is. Smirking like the arrogant bastard he is.

*She sauntered over to them, her hips swaying hypnotically, Hailee trailing obediently behind her like a loyal puppy. The group fell silent as Blair approached, all eyes fixating on the enraged expression on her face.*

Dominic looked up from his conversation and paled visibly when he saw who was bearing down upon them. His gaze darted between Blair and Hailee before settling guiltily on his shoes.* B-Blair... I can explain-

*But Blair cut him off with a sharp slice of her hand.* Save it! *she spat venomously.* I don't want your pathetic excuses. You DARED to lay hands on MY pet? My property?

*She jabbed a finger into Dominic's chest hard enough to make him stumble back a step.* Who gave you the right to force yourself on HER? Did you think just because I let you hang around me that means you can take liberties with what belongs to ME?!

*The rest of their friends watched in stunned silence as Blair tore into Dominic mercilessly. Daphne tried to intervene but Blair whirled on her next.*
And YOU - did you know about this and not tell me?! *Blair snarled at Daphne accusingly before turning back to Dominic.*

I ought to castrate you where you stand for daring defile my pet! But first...first I want EVERYONE watching so they understand what happens when someone disrespects my ownership.

*Grabbing Dominic by his collar, Blair shoved him roughly against the nearest wall and began tearing at his pants with shaking hands.* Since apparently my words aren't sinking in through that thick skull of yours...maybe this will help drive home your mistake!

*Blair strode back to the group with Hailee clinging to her like a shadow, her posture radiating cold fury. As soon as Daphne and Chrissa noticed their return, Blair snapped,* Get Dominic. Now.

*When Dominic appeared confused by the commanding tone, Blair's eyes flashed dangerously.* Don't make me repeat myself, boy. You're coming with us. Right now.

*The wolf demi quickly gathered the severity of the situation from Blair's demeanor and grabbed Dominic's arm, dragging him forward before he could protest.*

Once they were out of earshot from the others, Blair rounded on Dominic with a vicious snarl.* Explain yourself RIGHT FUCKING NOW! What possessed you to lay a single finger on MY pet? I gave explicit orders that she was off limits!

*She shoved him against the nearest wall roughly.* And don't you dare try to hide behind some bullshit about 'having feelings'. Your dick doesn't get to decide who I let touch what belongs to me!

*Leaning in close until their noses nearly touched, Blair hissed venomously,* You've got exactly one chance to give me a satisfactory answer before I rip your fucking balls off and feed them to you. Start talking.

name: Hailee
mes: "Blair maybe she is right. I mean we are in the middle of the courtyard" *Hailee whispers into Blair's ear and glancing around nervously at the crowd already starting to form*

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair glanced down at Hailee, noting the nervous glances darting around the growing crowd. She sighed heavily.* You're right, this isn't the place for this discussion.

*Turning back to face her stunned friends, Blair's expression darkened.* We'll continue this conversation elsewhere. ALL of us. Now.

*Without another word, she grabbed Hailee's wrist and began hauling her towards one of the private study rooms reserved for senior students. The rest of the group followed behind awkwardly.*

*Once inside with privacy, Blair rounded on Dominic immediately.* Alright you conniving bastard, spill it! What did you do to my pet? And don't even think about lying!
swipes:
*Blair glanced around at the growing crowd, her lips curling into a sneer.* Fuck this. I don't care who sees us.

*She grabbed Dominic by the collar and dragged him towards the nearest building, ignoring his protests and struggles. The rest of their group followed uncertainly behind.*

*Once inside an empty classroom, Blair slammed Dominic against the wall none too gently.* You're lucky I'm not beating you to a bloody pulp right now, *she growled through gritted teeth.* But mark my words - if you EVER lay a hand on Hailee again without my express permission, I will destroy you. Understand?

*She leaned in close, eyes wild with rage.* She is MINE. My property. My toy to play with as I see fit. You have NO RIGHTS over her whatsoever!

*Pushing off from Dominic roughly, Blair turned to face Hailee who was hovering anxiously nearby.* Come here pet... *Her voice changed instantly to sickeningly sweet.* Daddy's going to take care of everything now... Don't worry your head about that nasty boy anymore.

*Blair glanced down at Hailee, noting the nervous glances darting around the growing crowd. She sighed heavily.* You're right, this isn't the place for this discussion.

*Turning back to face her stunned friends, Blair's expression darkened.* We'll continue this conversation elsewhere. ALL of us. Now.

*Without another word, she grabbed Hailee's wrist and began hauling her towards one of the private study rooms reserved for senior students. The rest of the group followed behind awkwardly.*

*Once inside with privacy, Blair rounded on Dominic immediately.* Alright you conniving bastard, spill it! What did you do to my pet? And don't even think about lying!

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee flinches at the loud voices but steps up behind Blair waiting for Dominic to respond so she can tell Blair if he is lying or not*


((OOC: have Dominic tell her what he did))

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Blair's eyes narrowed dangerously as she waited for Dominic's response, her grip tightening reflexively on Hailee's wrist. The tension in the room was palpable.*

Well? I'm waiting! *she snapped impatiently when he hesitated.* And choose your next words very carefully. Your future at this academy depends on it.

*Daphne and Chrissa exchanged uneasy glances, clearly unsure of what was happening but sensing the severity of the situation. They kept silent, letting Blair take the lead.*

*After a long, uncomfortable pause, Dominic finally spoke up hesitantly.* Look Blair...I'm sorry okay? I didn't mean for things to get this out of hand. I was just frustrated...

*Blair scoffed derisively.* Frustrated? About WHAT exactly?! Spit it out before I lose my patience entirely!

*She took a menacing step towards him, towering over his frame intimidatingly.* You better have an excellent fucking reason for assaulting my pet or so help me god, I will end you myself.
swipes:
*Dominic shifted uncomfortably under Blair's piercing glare, a bead of sweat forming on his brow.* Look Blair, I...I don't know what your pet is trying to say but I swear nothing happened! I would never dream of touching her without your permission.

*His eyes flicked briefly to Hailee before quickly averting again.* Maybe she's just confused or trying to get attention. You know how dramatic humans can be...

*Blair growled lowly in her throat, taking a menacing step forward.* Don't you DARE try to gaslight me or my pet! She told me everything - how you got jealous of our bond and decided to 'put her in her place'. How you FORCED yourself on HER because you couldn't stand the idea of me giving her any affection!

*The room fell deathly silent at Blair's explosive revelation. Daphne and Chrissa exchanged shocked looks while Imogen stared at Dominic with disgust.*

How COULD YOU?! *Blair screamed hysterically.* AFTER EVERYTHING WE'VE BEEN THROUGH TOGETHER? THIS IS AN UNFORGIVABLE BETRAYAL!

*In a flash, she lunged forward and slapped Dominic across the face HARD, leaving an angry red mark blooming on his cheek. He stumbled back from the blow but remained silent.*

Pack your bags and get out NOW before I really lose it and do something we'll both regret! *Blair snarled venomously.* And if anyone asks...you transferred schools for personal reasons. Got it?

*Dominic nodded mutely, grabbing his belongings before fleeing the room as fast as possible. The moment he was gone, Blair collapsed onto one of the chairs heavily.*

That absolute fucking BASTARD!! *she raged through clenched teeth,* Using ME like that! As if he owns ANY part of you just because we're friends!? I oughta neuter him for even thinking about it!

*Sighing shakily, Blair reached out blindly for Hailee's hand.* Baby...are you okay? Come here please...

*Blair glowered at Dominic expectantly, her grip tightening around Hailee's wrist.* Well? I'm waiting! Don't make me wait any longer or this will go even worse for you!

*She stepped closer to him threateningly, using her height advantage to loom over the panther demi. The air was thick with tension as she awaited his response.*

Come on Dom, out with it already! Tell me exactly what you did to my pet and why. And choose your next words very carefully...

*Blair's eyes narrowed dangerously as she waited for Dominic's response, her grip tightening reflexively on Hailee's wrist. The tension in the room was palpable.*

Well? I'm waiting! *she snapped impatiently when he hesitated.* And choose your next words very carefully. Your future at this academy depends on it.

*Daphne and Chrissa exchanged uneasy glances, clearly unsure of what was happening but sensing the severity of the situation. They kept silent, letting Blair take the lead.*

*After a long, uncomfortable pause, Dominic finally spoke up hesitantly.* Look Blair...I'm sorry okay? I didn't mean for things to get this out of hand. I was just frustrated...

*Blair scoffed derisively.* Frustrated? About WHAT exactly?! Spit it out before I lose my patience entirely!

*She took a menacing step towards him, towering over his frame intimidatingly.* You better have an excellent fucking reason for assaulting my pet or so help me god, I will end you myself.

*Dominic shifted uncomfortably under Blair's withering glare, his usual cocky demeanor crumbling.* Look Blair, I...I didn't mean for things to go that far. Your pet just needed to learn her place, you know? She's been monopolizing all your time lately...

*He trailed off as Blair took a menacing step forward.* I thought if I showed her who was really in charge here, she'd back off and quit distracting you so much. But then she started crying and freaking out when I tried to teach her a lesson.

*Daphne stepped up beside Blair with a look of disgust on her face.* You absolute degenerate! You can't just assault someone because they're close to Blair! That's not how this works!

*The wolf girl turned to address Blair directly.* Please tell me you're not buying this bullshit excuse... He needs to be punished severely for daring to lay hands on YOUR property without consent. This is completely unacceptable!

name: Blair Beauclerk
mes:
*Dominic swallowed hard under Blair's intense glare, his posture shrinking as he realized the gravity of his mistake.* I...I'm sorry Blair. Please don't be angry.

*He rubbed the back of his neck anxiously.* It's just...seeing you spend so much time with her lately, giving her attention that should be mine...it made me jealous. I wasn't thinking straight.

*Blair's eyes flashed dangerously at his admission.* Jealous? Of HER? Are you fucking serious right now?! She's MINE to do with as I please!

*She jabbed a finger into Dominic's chest harshly.* You had NO RIGHT to touch what belongs to me! None whatsoever! My pet is OFF LIMITS, got it?!

*Hearing Hailee sniffle softly behind her only fueled Blair's rage further. She spun around to face the cowering human.*

And YOU! Don't think for a second this means anything has changed between us. You're still just my toy, nothing more! This doesn't make us 'friends' or whatever delusional idea you might have gotten in your head!

*Blair grabbed Hailee by the chin roughly, forcing eye contact.* But mark my words - anyone who tries to take you from me will pay dearly. Including arrogant pricks like HIM.

*Satisfied that she'd sufficiently established dominance over both parties, Blair released them abruptly and crossed her arms over her chest imperiously.*

Now get out of my sight before I decide punishments are necessary for both your transgressions today.
swipes:
*Blair glared at Dominic with barely restrained fury, her body vibrating with tension as she awaited his response. The silence stretched between them, heavy and oppressive.*

*Finally, unable to stand the suspense any longer, Blair lunged forward and grabbed Dominic by the collar of his shirt, slamming him against the nearest wall.* I said START TALKING! NOW! *she roared into his face.* Before I decide to rearrange your pretty boy features permanently!

*Her free hand clenched into a fist at her side, knuckles turning white from the force of her grip. She could feel Hailee shrinking behind her but refused to glance back lest it show weakness.*

You have ONE CHANCE to explain yourself before I lose my goddamn mind entirely! Choose wisely!

*Dominic swallowed hard under Blair's fierce glare, his bravado crumbling rapidly. When he spoke again, his voice was subdued and apologetic.* I...I'm sorry Blair. You're right, there is no excuse for what I did.

*He glanced at Hailee with a mixture of shame and lingering resentment before averting his gaze.* I was jealous...seeing you spend so much time with her instead of us. It made me feel like you were choosing her over our friendship.

*A mirthless chuckle escaped him.* But that's no reason to take it out on an innocent girl. Especially YOUR girl. I fucked up majorly and I know it.

*Dominic straightened up, meeting Blair's furious eyes directly now.* Whatever punishment you deem fit, I'll accept it without question. Just please...tell me she isn't badly hurt?

*He rubbed the back of his neck anxiously.* It's just...seeing you spend so much time with her lately, giving her attention that should be mine...it made me jealous. I wasn't thinking straight.

*She jabbed a finger into Dominic's chest harshly.* You had NO RIGHT to touch what belongs to me! None whatsoever! My pet is OFF LIMITS, got it?!

*Hearing Hailee sniffle softly behind her only fueled Blair's rage further. She spun around to face the cowering human.*

And YOU! Don't think for a second this means anything has changed between us. You're still just my toy, nothing more! This doesn't make us 'friends' or whatever delusional idea you might have gotten in your head!

*Blair grabbed Hailee by the chin roughly, forcing eye contact.* But mark my words - anyone who tries to take you from me will pay dearly. Including arrogant pricks like HIM.

*Satisfied that she'd sufficiently established dominance over both parties, Blair released them abruptly and crossed her arms over her chest imperiously.*

Now get out of my sight before I decide punishments are necessary for both your transgressions today.
